com.saic.uicds.core.em.endpoint

Class LEITSCServiceEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.saic.uicds.core.em.endpoint.LEITSCServiceEndpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.util.ServiceNamespaces

    @Endpoint
public class LEITSCServiceEndpoint
extends Object
implements com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.util.ServiceNamespaces
    The UICDS LEITSC Service allows clients to create, update, close, and archive UICDS incidents based on LEITSC Detailed Call For Service messages.

    The actions to apply are based on the Detailed Call For Service Payload/ServiceCall/ActivityStatus value. The following table shows how this value is interpreted by UICDS:

    ValueUICDS Action
    CREATEDCreate a new incident
    CLEAREDClose and archive the incident
    Not CREATED or CLEAREDUpdate the incident

    The following table shows the elements from the LEITSC Detailed Call For Service message that are used to populate the UICDSIncidentType document.

    ActivityDescriptionText
    LEITSC ElementUICDSIncidentType Element
    Payload/ServiceCall/ActitivityDescriptionText
    Payload/ServiceCall/ServiceCallAugmentation/CallTypeTextActivityCategoryText
    Payload/ServiceCall/ServiceCallAugmentation/ServiceCallAririvedDateActivityDate
    Payload/Location/LocationAddressIncidentLocation/LocationAddress
    Playload/ServiceCallResponseLocation/LocationTwoDimensionalGeographicCoordinatesIncidentLocation/LocationArea/AreaCircularRegion
    ExchangeMetadata/DataSubmitterMetadata/OrganizationIdentificationIncidentJurisdictionalOrganization
    ServiceCall/ActivityIdentificationIncidentEvent/ActivityIdentification
    ServiceCall/ActivityStatusIncidentEvent/ActivityStatus
    Payload/ServiceCall/ServiceCallAugmentation/ServiceCallAririvedDateIncidentEvent/ActivityDate
    ExchangeMetadata/DataSubmitterMetadata/OrganizationIdentificationIncidentEvent/ActivityDescriptionText

    Author:
    Aruna Hau
    See Also:
    Appendix: LEITSCService.wsdl, Appendix: LEITSCService.xsd, LEITSC IEPD

public org.uicds.leitscService.PostDetailedCFSMessageResponseDocument postDetailedCFSMessage(org.uicds.leitscService.PostDetailedCFSMessageRequestDocument requestDoc)
                                                                                      throws org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException,
                                                                                             DetailedCFSMessageException,
                                                                                             DetailedCFSMessageXMLException,
                                                                                             LEITSCIncidentPublicationException
        Posts a Detailed CFS message to the UICDS core. A UICDS incident will be created, updated, or closed/archived, based on the message's activity status.
